comment.author: 27309380@N06
comment._content:
This is such an elegant racer. I just love how even the tail wheel is streamlined! 

Something about the earlier race planes that embodied the thrill, the danger and the beauty of early aviation. Radial motors, polished aluminum props, bold, contrasting paint schemes and rounded, stout wings and fuselages! All with daring young pilots in leather and khaki with linen flight caps and goggles for that extra inspiring image!
